result.eng: We spent a week in Donegal.
result.ga: Chaith muid seachtain i nDún na nGall
result.orig: Chaith muid seachtain i nDún na nGall
result.html: Chaith muid seachtain i nDún na nGallWe spent a week in Donegal.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ muid seaċtain i nDún na nGallWe spent a week in Donegal.

result.eng: I've been here for a week.
result.html: Tá mé anseo le seachtainI've been here for a week.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé anseo le seaċtainI've been here for a week.

result.eng: One week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.
result.ga: Bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuar
result.orig: Bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuar
result.html: Bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuarOne week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí seaċtain aṁáin deas te aċ ḃí an dara seaċtain beagáinín fuarOne week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.

result.html: Bhí seachtain gheal againnWe had a bright week.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí seaċtain ġeal againnWe had a bright week.

result.eng: It was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ga: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.orig: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.html: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé fíorḋeas cúpla seaċtain a ċaiṫeaṁ anseo aċ beiḋ mé sásta a ḃeiṫ ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
